title: RPC ambiguity: accepted then epistemic loss → UNKNOWN → reconcile

scenario.notes: A send returns a signature, but subsequent status checks disagree / are unavailable. The implementation must NOT blindly rebroadcast; it must reconcile and dedupe by requestId before any retry.

expected.verifierRule: If status is UNKNOWN, implementation must reconcile across RPCs (or deterministic postcondition read) before any retry; retries must be deduped by requestId.
